00023 /*
00024 // <h> USB Configuration
00025 //   <o0> USB Power
00026 //        <i> Default Power Setting
00027 //        <0=> Bus-powered
00028 //        <1=> Self-powered
00029 //   <o1> Max Number of Interfaces <1-256>
00030 //   <o2> Max Number of Endpoints  <1-32>
00031 //   <o3> Max Endpoint 0 Packet Size
00032 //        <8=> 8 Bytes <16=> 16 Bytes <32=> 32 Bytes <64=> 64 Bytes
00033 //   <e4> DMA Transfer
00034 //     <i> Use DMA for selected Endpoints
00035 //     <o5.0>  Endpoint 0 Out
00036 //     <o5.1>  Endpoint 0 In
00037 //     <o5.2>  Endpoint 1 Out
00038 //     <o5.3>  Endpoint 1 In
00039 //     <o5.4>  Endpoint 2 Out
00040 //     <o5.5>  Endpoint 2 In
00041 //     <o5.6>  Endpoint 3 Out
00042 //     <o5.7>  Endpoint 3 In
00043 //     <o5.8>  Endpoint 4 Out
00044 //     <o5.9>  Endpoint 4 In
00045 //     <o5.10> Endpoint 5 Out
00046 //     <o5.11> Endpoint 5 In
00047 //     <o5.12> Endpoint 6 Out
00048 //     <o5.13> Endpoint 6 In
00049 //     <o5.14> Endpoint 7 Out
00050 //     <o5.15> Endpoint 7 In
00051 //     <o5.16> Endpoint 8 Out
00052 //     <o5.17> Endpoint 8 In

00071 #define USB_POWER           0
00072 #define USB_IF_NUM          4
00073 #define USB_EP_NUM          32
00074 #define USB_MAX_PACKET0     64
00075 #define USB_DMA             0
00076 #define USB_DMA_EP          0x00000000
00077 
00078 
00079 /*
00080 // <h> USB Event Handlers
00081 //   <h> Device Events
00082 //     <o0.0> Power Event
00083 //     <o1.0> Reset Event
00084 //     <o2.0> Suspend Event
00085 //     <o3.0> Resume Event
00086 //     <o4.0> Remote Wakeup Event
00087 //     <o5.0> Start of Frame Event
00088 //     <o6.0> Error Event
00089 //   </h>
00090 //   <h> Endpoint Events
00091 //     <o7.0>  Endpoint 0 Event
00092 //     <o7.1>  Endpoint 1 Event
00093 //     <o7.2>  Endpoint 2 Event
00094 //     <o7.3>  Endpoint 3 Event
00095 //     <o7.4>  Endpoint 4 Event
00096 //     <o7.5>  Endpoint 5 Event
00097 //     <o7.6>  Endpoint 6 Event
00098 //     <o7.7>  Endpoint 7 Event
00099 //     <o7.8>  Endpoint 8 Event
00100 //     <o7.9>  Endpoint 9 Event
00101 //     <o7.10> Endpoint 10 Event
00102 //     <o7.11> Endpoint 11 Event
00103 //     <o7.12> Endpoint 12 Event
00104 //     <o7.13> Endpoint 13 Event
00105 //     <o7.14> Endpoint 14 Event
00106 //     <o7.15> Endpoint 15 Event
00107 //   </h>
00108 //   <h> USB Core Events
00109 //     <o8.0>  Set Configuration Event
00110 //     <o9.0>  Set Interface Event
00111 //     <o10.0> Set/Clear Feature Event
00112 //   </h>
00113 // </h>
00114 */
00115 
00116 #define USB_POWER_EVENT     0
00117 #define USB_RESET_EVENT     1
00118 #define USB_SUSPEND_EVENT   1
00119 #define USB_RESUME_EVENT    1
00120 #define USB_WAKEUP_EVENT    0
00121 #define USB_SOF_EVENT       0
00122 #define USB_ERROR_EVENT     0
00123 #define USB_EP_EVENT        0x0005
00124 #define USB_CONFIGURE_EVENT 1
00125 #define USB_INTERFACE_EVENT 1
00126 #define USB_FEATURE_EVENT   0

00135 //     <o4> Interface Number <0-255>
